item.title: ChiBike
item.description: /c/ChiBike on midwest.social https://midwest.social/c/chibike Description ### A Lemmy Community for Chicago's Cyclists. #### Bike Links - [Chicago's Official Bike Maps](https://chicagocompletestreets.org/sample-page-2/cycling/) - [Chicago's Mellow Bike Map](https://chicagoreader.com/news-politics/the-mellow-chicago-bike-map-our-guide-to-the-lowest-stress-routes-in-the-city/) - [The Chainlink](https://thechainlink.org/) - [Group Rides](https://thechainlink.org/page/2017-group-training-rides-in-the-chicago-area) - [Event Calendar](https://thechainlink.org/events) - [CPD's Bike Registration Program](https://operations.chicagopolice.org/BikeRegistration/Account/Login) - [Bike Tag](https://sarahlikesbikes.com/chibike/) #### Local Bike Shop Shout Outs - [Working Bikes](https://workingbikes.org/) - Non-profit shop that sells used bikes and offers classes - [Recycler](https://www.therecyclery.org/) - Another Non-profit doing cool shit for the community

item.title: Democracy
item.description: /c/Democracy on midwest.social https://midwest.social/c/democracy Description A community to discuss Democracy in all its forms. ____ What is Democracy? ---- > Democracy is a form of government in which the people have the authority to deliberate and decide legislation (direct democracy), or to choose governing officials to do so (representative democracy). Who is considered part of the people and how authority is shared among or delegated by the people has changed over time and at different rates in different countries.

item.title: Detroit
item.description: /c/Detroit on midwest.social https://midwest.social/c/detroit Description The birthplace of techno and the Motown sound. The center of the automotive industry. *Resurget cineribus*. Welcome to [!detroit@midwest.social](/c/detroit@midwest.social), a place to talk about what’s happening in Detroit. If you’re interested in participating, please subscribe. ## Rules Please respect each other. Post anything related to Detroit or the two cities within it, Hamtramck and Highland Park. Racist and classist language will not be tolerated. ## Credits Banner: Steve Lietzau, [*Detroit Night Sky.

item.title: Electric Vehicles
item.description: /c/Electric Vehicles on midwest.social https://midwest.social/c/electricvehicles Description # About A community for US based EV enthusiasts. # Rules 1. Post must relate to electric vehicles. 2. Try to avoid irrelevant posts (e.g. posts about vehicles not available in the US, vaporware puff pieces, etc) 3. If posting an article, please set your title to be the same as the title of the article. 4. If posting an article behind a paywall, please include a transcription or link to non-paywalled material.

item.description: /c/Fort Wayne, IN on midwest.social https://midwest.social/c/fortwayne Description New, politics, events, and general discussion in Fort Wayne, IN. #**Rules** 1. **Respect Everyone:** No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, or overall hate speech. 2. **SFW Only:** Do not post any NSFW content unless it is a news story or the result of a local event. (If you post NSFW content please mark it.) 3. **No Doxing:** Do not post any identifying information unless it is public (i.

item.title: Kitty Terminal Emulator
item.description: /c/Kitty Terminal Emulator on midwest.social https://midwest.social/c/kittyterminal Description *The fast, feature-rich, GPU based terminal emulator* A place for discussion and questions about the kitty terminal emulator. **kitty feature overview:** - **Fast:** Offloads rendering to the GPU for [lower system load](https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/performance/) - **Capable:** Graphics, with [images and animations](https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/graphics-protocol/) - **Scriptable:** Control from [scripts or the shell](https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/remote-control/) - **Composable:** Programmable tabs, [splits](https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/layouts/#splits-layout) and multiple [layouts](https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/layouts/) to manage windows - **Cross-platform** *(see Supported OS below)*
